sqlMap.select: select top(1) pv.BIN_ProductID as productId, pv.BIN_ProductVendorID as prtVendorId, p.UnitCode as unitCode, Convert(decimal(18,2),pp.SalePrice) as price, p.NameTotal as nameTotal, p.OriginalBrand as originalBrand, pv.BarCode as barCode from Basis.BIN_ProductVendor pv Left Join Basis.BIN_ProductPrice pp on (pv.BIN_ProductID=pp.BIN_ProductID) Left Join Basis.BIN_Product p on (pv.BIN_ProductID=p.BIN_ProductID) where p.UnitCode=#B# and #systime# between pp.StartDate and pp.EndDate

SELECT top(1) pa.DescriptionDtl as descriptionDtl, pr.RuleCond as ruleCond, CONVERT(nvarchar(10),pr.EndTime,120) as endTime FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity pa LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRule pr on (pa.ActivityCode = pr.RuleCode) where pa.ActivityCode=#maincode#
sqlMap.insert: insert into Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain( BIN_OrganizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID, CounterCode, TradeNoIF, TotalQuantity, OriginalAmount, DiscountAmount, TotalAmount, MemberCode, MemberName, MemberPhone, MemberLevel, MainState, IntegralAmount, SendFlag, BPCode, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatePGM )values( #organizationInfoID#, #brandInfoId#, #CC#, #TN#, #totalQuantity#, #originalAmount#, #discountAmount#, #TotalAmount#, #MC#, #MN#, #MP#, #ML#, '0', #computedPoint#, #SendFlag#, #BP#, '1', GETDATE(), #createPGM# )

insert into Campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultCoupon ( TradeNoIF, CouponNumber, Unitcode, Barcode, CouponAmount, CouponActualAmount, CouponType, CouponActivityCode, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatePGM )values( #TN#, #CouponCode#, #Unitcode#, #Barcode#, #Price#, #ActualAmount#, #CouponType#, #Maincode#, '1', GETDATE(), 'BINOLSSPRM74' )

insert into Campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultRule ( TradeNoIF, Price, ActivityMainCode, ActivityName, ActivityCode, Unitcode, Barcode, RuleDetailType, Quantity, TagPrice, ComputePoint, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatePGM )values( #TN#, #salePrice#, #maincode#, #mainname#, #activitycode#, #unitCode#, #barCode#, #type#, #quantity#, #price#, #computePoint#, '1', GETDATE(), 'BINOLSSPRM74' )

insert into Campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultShoppingCart ( TradeNoIF, Unitcode, Barcode, Quantity, TagPrice, Price, ActivityMainCode, ValidFlag, CreateTime, CreatePGM )values( #TN#, #unitCode#, #barCode#, #quantity#, #price#, #salePrice#, #maincode#, '1', GETDATE(), 'BINOLSSPRM74' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT top(1) A.BrandCode AS brandCode, A.DataSourceName AS dataSourceName, A.OldDataSourceName AS oldDataSourceName, A.IFDataSourceName, A.AESKey FROM dbo.BIN_BrandDataSourceConfig A WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1' and A.BrandCode=#brandCode#

SELECT top(1) oz.BIN_OrganizationID as organizationID, oz.BIN_OrganizationInfoID as organizationInfoID, oz.BIN_BrandInfoID as brandInfoID, oz.DepartCode as departCode, oi.OrgCode as orgCode FROM Basis.BIN_Organization oz Left join Basis.BIN_OrganizationInfo oi on (oz.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = oi.BIN_OrganizationInfoID) WHERE oz.DepartCode=#CC#
SELECT COUNT(1) as count FROM( SELECT BIN_IntelligentResultId FROM Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain WHERE TradeNoIF=#TN# )T
SELECT top(1) LevelName as levelName FROM members.BIN_MemberLevel WHERE LevelCode=#ML# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID =#organizationInfoID# AND BIN_BrandInfoID=#brandInfoId#

SELECT ath.MainCode, ath.ActivityType, Convert(nvarchar(10),ath.ActivityFromDate,120) as ActivityFromDate, Convert(nvarchar(10),ath.ActivityToDate,120) as ActivityToDate, pr.RuleName, pr.RuleType, pa.DescriptionDtl FROM [Promotion].[BIN_ActivityTransHis] ath LEFT JOIN [Promotion].[BIN_PromotionRule] pr ON (ath.MainCode=pr.RuleCode) LEFT JOIN [Promotion].BIN_PromotionActivity pa ON (ath.MainCode=pa.ActivityCode) WHERE ath.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# and ath.BIN_OrganizationID in(-8888,#organizationID#) and ath.ValidFlag = '1' and #tradeDate# between ath.ActivityFromDate and ath.ActivityToDate

SELECT top(1) #price# as price, p.OriginalBrand as originalBrand, #nameTotal# as nameTotal, #barCode# as barcode, #salePrice# as salePrice, #quantity# as quantity, pv.BIN_ProductVendorID as prtVendorId, #unitCode# as unitcode, #productId# as productId, #maincode# as maincode FROM Basis.BIN_Product p Left Join Basis.BIN_ProductVendor pv on (pv.BIN_ProductID=p.BIN_ProductID) WHERE p.BIN_ProductID=#productId#

SELECT BIN_IntelligentResultId as intelligentResultId, TradeNoIF as TN, Convert(nvarchar(10),CreateTime,120) as TD, Convert(nvarchar(10),CreateTime,108) as TT, CounterCode as CC, MemberCode as MC, MemberName as MN, MemberPhone as MP, MemberLevel as ML, BPCode as BP, TotalAmount , BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS organizationInfoID, BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoID FROM Campaign.BIN_GetIntelligentResultMain WHERE TradeNoIF=#tradeNoIF#

SELECT rsc.Barcode as barcode, rsc.Unitcode as unitcode, rsc.Quantity as quantity, rsc.Price as salePrice, rsc.TagPrice as price, rsc.ActivityMainCode as maincode, p.NameTotal as nameTotal, p.BIN_ProductID as productId, p.OriginalBrand as originalBrand, pv.BIN_ProductVendorID as prtVendorId FROM Campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultShoppingCart rsc LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Product p ON (rsc.Unitcode=p.UnitCode) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor pv ON (p.BIN_ProductID=pv.BIN_ProductID) WHERE rsc.TradeNoIF=#tradeNoIF#

SELECT r.ActivityMainCode as maincode, cate.CateValue as ruleType FROM campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultRule r LEFT JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCate cate ON r.ActivityMainCode=cate.RuleCode and cate.validFlag='1' WHERE r.TradeNoIF=#tradeNoIF#
SELECT CouponNumber as couponCode FROM campaign.BIN_IntelligentResultCoupon WHERE TradeNoIF=#tradeNoIF#
